content: A hospital wants to improve its emergency response time by adding more ambulances to its fleet. Currently, they have 15 ambulances, each responding to an average of 20 calls per day. They want to reduce the average response time from 12 minutes to 8 minutes. Determine how many additional ambulances are needed to achieve this goal, assuming that each ambulance has the same capacity and efficiency.
